text:
Memorial Day looks different in 2020. Large backyard barbecues, pool parties and the traditional long-weekend trip may not be possible. However, shopping Memorial Day sales is weekend tradition that perseveres.

Depending on your state, in-store shopping sprees may not be possible (or advisable). Luckily, there are plenty of online sales taking place during the long weekend. Many of them are already live. These are the Memorial Day sales to shop if you want to save on furniture, mattresses, appliances, clothing and more:

Academy Sports + Outdoors.

Ashley Furniture.

Bear Mattress.

Big Lots.

Brooklyn Bedding.

Dick's Sporting Goods.

DiscountGlasses.com.

Godiva.

Lenovo.

Lowe's.

Macy's.

Nest Bedding.

PlushBeds.

Overstock.

Ulta Beauty.

Read on for more information on the best Memorial Day sales for 2020.

Academy Sports + Outdoors

The retailer is offering sales on summer necessities through May 25. Highlights include up to 25% off Nike, Under Armour and Adidas apparel and shoes, up to 25% off athletic shoes from Asics, New Balance and Puma, and up to 50% off swimwear.

Meanwhile, military veterans, first responders and front-line health care professionals get 10% off an entire purchase through May 25 in stores and online. To get this extra discount, you'll need to present a military ID if shopping in a store, or verify your identity when shopping online.

Ashley Furniture

The Memorial Day sale is already live and features up to 50% off select mattresses and bedroom furniture.

Bear Mattress

Get 20% off across the entire site, plus two free Cloud pillows with every mattress or bundle purchase, through May 26. Use code MDW20 at checkout. Members of the military and first responders can get 25% off by verifying their identity with identification-checking service ID.me and shopping via Bear's site.

Big Lots

Memorial Day deals are already live on the retailer's site and include 20% off select pools and backyard water playscapes, 25% off beach towels, 20% off home gardening tools, 30% off patio cushions and toss pillows and more. Plus, first responders, medical professionals, active military personnel, veterans and commercial drivers get 15% off in stores and online. This discount can be used on top of Memorial Day deals.

Brooklyn Bedding

Get 25% off across the entire site, which sells mattresses and bedding, from May 21 to May 25.

Dick's Sporting Goods

The Memorial Day sale includes up to 30% off select bikes, up to 40% off fishing equipment, up to 25% off Yeti drinkware and a slew of discounts on apparel from Crocs, Oakley, Nike, The North Face and more.

DiscountGlasses.com

Need new frames or prescription lenses? Use code MEMORIALDAY30 from May 22 to May 29 to get 30% off.

Godiva

May 22 to May 25, get 20% off orders over $50 and 25% off orders over $100. All orders over $15 get free shipping.

Lenovo

Memorial Day Sneak Peek deals are live and include savings on an array of traditional and convertible two-in-one laptops. Individual deals have different promo codes, so be sure to make note of those before you check out. Savings include $600 off the Yoga C930 14-inch laptop and $1,710 off the 14-inch ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 3 laptop.

Lowe's

Through June 3, get up to 40% off select major appliances. The sale includes washers, dryers, dishwashers, fridges and ranges.

Macy's

The department store has launched some online Memorial Day deals early. The early deals span rugs, furniture and mattresses, with discounts of 20% to 60%. Based on past years, Macy's can be expected to offer even broader deals across the store closer to the holiday weekend.

Nest Bedding

The online mattress and bedding retailer is offering 25% off your entire cart May 14 to May 31. No promo code is required.

PlushBeds

The organic mattress company is offering up to $600 off memory foam mattresses and up to $1,250 off organic latex mattresses May 19 to June 22.

Overstock

Overstock's Memorial Day sale is already live and runs until June 1. It features up to 70% off thousands of items and has some particularly strong deals in the home decor category, including patio furniture starting at $99, rugs starting at $49 and an extra 15% off bedroom and living room furniture.

Ulta Beauty

The Gorgeous Hair event runs the entire month of May with daily deals. Memorial Day weekend's lineup includes 50% off the Elchim 3900 Healthy Ionic Dryer on May 23, 50% off the Hot Tools Professional Turbo Ionic Dryer in pink on May 24 and 50% off Alterna My Hair My Canvas New Beginnings Exfoliating Cleanser on May 25.
